name: Besample
description:
Besample is a data marketplace that empowers research beyond the West. 

With a focus on the growing Global South, Besample provides human-focused researchers across healthcare, industry, and academia with access to primary data from a diverse and representative pool of people in 42 countries of Africa, Asia, Latin America, and CIS.
one_liner:
Besample is a data marketplace that empowers research beyond the West. 

With a focus on the growing Global South, Besample provides human-focused researchers across healthcare, industry, and academia with access to primary data from a diverse and representative pool of people in 42 countries of Africa, Asia, Latin America, and CIS.
